Paragraph.Text: Charming superior country house style hotel sensitively refurbished, retaining all the grace and style of its heritage. Hotels bedrooms are well equipped. Hotel has a traditional english restaurant and cocktail bar. Paragraph.Text: -Eml:general.Frimleyhall@macdonald-hotels.Co.Uk -url:www.Macdonaldhotels.Co.Uk/frimleyhall . - Lhr-heathrow airport . . . . . . 18.0 MI-29.0 KM - lgw-gatwick airport . . . . . . .35.0 MI-56.3 KM -property description- situated in 3 acres of landscaped grounds macdonald frimley hall and spa is a classic ivy clad victorian manor house. Recently refurbished the hotel offers luxury contemporary style bedrooms. Alongside more traditional feature rooms the new linden restaurant offers 2 rosettes awarded cuisine and the option of al-fresco dining in the summer months. The recent addition of a vital health and beauty spa provides the finest facilities in the area. Attractions - ascot race course . . . . . . . . 4.0 MI-6.4km - guildford cathedral . . . . . . . 4.0 MI-6.4km - legoland . . . . . . . . . . . . .8.0 MI-12.KM 9 - windsor castle . . . . . . . . . .4.0 MI-6.4km location description set in 3 acres of landscaped grounds the macdonald frimley hall hotel and spa is part of a residential area. Only 5 minutes away from the city centre of camberley. Close to london heathrow or west england via m3. Paragraph.Text: The only Heathrow Airport hotel with direct access to Terminal 4 via a covered walkway and Terminal 5 via a Heathrow Hoppa bus, the Hilton London Heathrow Airport hotel is just 15 minutes by Heathrow Express train from central London. Dine in style at a choice of 3 restaurants, hold a meeting for 2-300 or relax in the pool and luxury health club. - Lhr-heathrow airport.............0.0 MI-0.0 KM - lgw-gatwick airport..............37.0 MI-59.5 KM - stn-stansted.....................68.0 MI-109.4km - downtown ........................17.0 MI-27.4 KM . Property description- heathrow airport hotel is linked to terminal 4 via a covered walkway. The hotel hoppa bus h59 transfers guests to and from terminal 5 every 30 minutes. Charge 4.50 each way. Terminals 1 2 and 3 are reached from terminal 4 via the complimentary heathrow connect train. Guests can take the heathrow express train to paddington in central london in only 15 minutes. We offer 161 newly refurbished deluxe and executive rooms with kingsize beds that are now available. A spacious well lit work desk 42-inch flat screen tv and walk-in glass showers ensure comfort and convenience. There is a 24-hour gym and two treatment rooms available next to the indoor pool. An outdoor beach terrace with loungers and a choice of three restaurants is available on site. Attractions- ascot races 14.0 MI -22.5 KM bedfont lakes 2.0 MI -3.2 KM biscester shopping village 54.0 MI -86.9 KM chessington world of adventures 13.0 MI -20.9 KM city center 17.0 MI -27.4 KM epsom downs 18.0 MI -29.0 KM epsom downs racecourse 18.0 MI -29.0 KM eton 9.0 MI -14.5 KM eton college 9.0 MI -14.5 KM hampton court palace 8.0 MI -12.9 KM kempton park racecourse 6.0 MI -9.7 KM kew gardens 9.0 MI -14.5 KM legoland 14.0 MI -22.5 KM london 15.0 MI -24.1 KM sandown golf course 10.0 MI -16.1 KM stockley pines golf course 6.0 MI -9.7 KM thorpe park 7.0 MI -11.3 KM twickenham rugby ground 6.0 MI -9.7 KM wentworth golf course 10.0 MI -16.1 KM westfield shopping centre 12.0 MI -19.3 KM windsor 9.0 MI -14.5 KM windsor castle 9.0 MI -14.5 KM windsor sightseeing bus 9.0 MI -14.5 KM corporate locations- bp 10.0 MI- 16.1 KM british airways 1.0 MI- 1.6 KM british airways sep training office2.0 MI- 3.2 KM british telecom 5.0 MI- 8.0 KM cisco systems 2.0 MI- 3.2 KM dhl internatrional 1.0 MI- 1.6 KM excel 5.0 MI- 8.0 KM federal express (fedex) 2.0 MI- 3.2 KM glaxosmithkline 5.0 MI- 8.0 KM hitachi 10.0 MI- 16.1 KM ibm 2.0 MI- 3.2 KM sap uk ltd 2.0 MI- 3.2 KM samsung european hq 4.0 MI- 6.4 KM sky broadcasting 5.0 MI- 8.0 KM . . Only Heathrow Airport hotel with direct access to Terminal 5 via a covered walkway and Terminals 1, 2, 3 / Terminal 4 via courtesy Heathrow Express/ Connect rail connection and only 21 minutes from Central London by train. Sofitel London Heathrow boasts 605 non-smoking bedrooms including 27 suites, 45 meeting rooms, 2 restaurants, 2 bars and a Tea Salon as well as private dining options. The hotel also offers a Hair Salon, a State-of-the-art Health Spa and Gym as well as on-site car park.

Paragraph.Text: So close to the action you're almost in the team changing rooms, our Twickenham Stadium hotel puts you in prime position for every try and tackle - as well as west London's must-see sights. But the star attraction has to be our super comfy new generation bedrooms, with an impressive 40" flat screen TV and brand new, slumber-inducing, king- Hypnos bed. - If rugby isn't your thing, you're perfectly placed for Kew Gardens and the grandeur of Hampton Court Palace. And those central London sights are just a train journey away. So whether you're 'Swinging Lo' or flying high, you're onto a winner with our friendly team, fantastic restaurant and those extra-comfy beds. Service Charge Of 5.63 GBP Per Booking No Extra Tax Extra adult 0.00 GBP Extra child 0.00 GBP rollaway for adult 0.00 GBP rollaway for child 0.00 GBP cot 0.00 GBP

Paragraph.Text:
Five minutes from the M3, the Hilton Bracknell hotel has just undergone a Â£1m refurbishment. Revive yourself in the LivingWell Health Club with gym, pool or beauty treatment rooms. Relax in the Jacuzzi and sauna or do business in one of 12 meeting rooms for up to 250, with wireless internet access in the lounge and Bar. The hotel is 30 minutes' drive from Heathrow.
Enjoy coffees or smoothies in the Lounge Bar, a roast dinner from The Larder Restaurant's carvery and 24-hour drinks in the Hilton Bracknell hotel's Bar. All Hilton Bracknell hotel rooms have high-speed internet access. Step up to a Deluxe Room for a marble bathroom.
Stay at the Hilton Bracknell hotel and unwind in the heated indoor pool or Jacuzzi, pamper yourself in the beauty treatment rooms and work out in the gym. Visit Bracknell attractions such as Coral Reef Water World or go further afield to Windsor Castle, Ascot Racecourse and the rides at Thorpe Park. - Lhr-heathrow airport.............23.0 MI-37.0 KM - lgw-gatwick airport..............44.0 MI-70.8 KM - downtown ........................2.0 MI-3.2 KM . Property description- this hotel is 100 % non smoking five minutes from the m3 the hilton bracknell hotel is just a 30 minute drive from heathrow airport. Revive yourself in the livingwell health club with gym pool or beauty treatment rooms. Relax in the bubble pool and sauna or do business in one of 11 meeting rooms for up to 250 with wireless internet access in the lounge and bar. Relax in the modern lounge and bar area at the hilton bracknell hotel while enjoying a coffee or a drink or dine in the larder restaurant and savor traditional english cuisine. Test your skills in planet h our interactive games rooms great for both children and the young at heart. Wifi is available in the lounge and bar while all bedrooms have wired high-speed internet access. Visit bracknell attractions such as coral reef water world or go further afield to windsor castle ascot racecourse legoland and the rides at thorpe park. Positioned 2.8 miles from Camberley Railway Station and 7.8 miles from the renowned Ascot Racecourse, Frimley Hotel is the ideal place to stay in this quaint English town. Those wanting a relaxing break can unwind at Camberley Heath Golf Club, located just half a mile away. Alternatively, families looking for a more fun-packed time can enjoy a day out at Legoland, home to a variety of unique rides and interactive activities, or Thorpe Park, where you can jump aboard a range of thrilling rollercoasters, both under 15 miles from Frimley. Nearest airport - heathrow - 24 miles / 38 KM nearest city - london - 30 miles - 48 KM www.Travelodge.Co.Uk All travelodges conform to local fire and safety regulations.All rooms have smoke detectors fitted. None gbp 20 % tax included Ex none ra none cr none EC none rc none gbp

Paragraph.Text: Situated 0.1 miles from Uxbridge underground station and 6 miles from Heathrow Airport, the London Uxbridge Hotel is a great accommodation option for those wishing to catch an early morning flight. Visit Pavillions Shopping Centre, 0.2 miles away, and bag a bargain in any one of the 100 stores or take a trip to the Farmers Market, a weekly event held in Uxbridge town. Colne Valley Park is also located nearby and it is the first significant area of countryside in West London. Additionally, this is ideally situated for those looking for hotels near Brunel University, with the reputable establishment less than a mile and a half away. Whether you want to visit current students or simply explore this delightful region of Western Uxbridge for work or pleasure, the London Uxbridge Hotel is a fantastic choice. This hotel has recently been updated with our fresh new look and features Travelodge's new room design complete with Dreamer Bed so you can be sure of a great night's sleep. Nearest airport - heathrow 6 miles nearest city - uxbridge www.Travelodge.Co.Uk All travelodges conform to local fire and safety regulations.All rooms have smoke detectors fitted. No service charge applies 20 % tax included Rates are per room not per occupant
